entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:32 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 11:51 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:43 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:43 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:43 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
